stripeForm.eligibleForInsidersAccess:
**Functional Purpose**: Alternative text for an icon indicating eligibility for Insiders Access.
**UI Location**: Donations form, 'Monthly Recurring' tab, next to the tab title.
**When Users See This**: When viewing the donation form, specifically the monthly recurring option.
**Technical Context**: This text is used as the `alt` attribute for an icon. It should describe the icon's purpose.
**Current English**: "Eligible for Insiders Access"
form.monthlyRecurring:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the tab allowing users to set up a monthly recurring donation.
**UI Location**: Donations form, tab navigation.
**When Users See This**: When viewing the donation form.
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a UI tab.
**Current English**: "Monthly Recurring"
form.oneOff:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the tab allowing users to make a one-off donation.
**UI Location**: Donations form, tab navigation.
**When Users See This**: When viewing the donation form.
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a UI tab.
**Current English**: "One-off"
